description: System-generated unique identifier for this meter change record.
Date and time the meter replacement or reset event was recorded.
Identifier of the user or service that logged the meter change.
Internal identifier of the asset whose meter was changed; links to the asset master.
Snapshot of the asset’s external/business identifier at the time of the change; preserves history if the master value later changes.
Snapshot of the asset’s description captured at the time of the change for historical context.
Code indicating which meter was affected (e.g., odometer, engine hours). Likely references a meter type lookup; confirm codes with SME.
Snapshot of the meter identifier at change time to preserve history.
Snapshot of the meter’s description captured at the time of the change.
Reading on the removed meter at change time, preserved for audit and cumulative calculations.
Initial reading on the installed meter immediately after the change, preserved for audit and baseline calculations.
Calculated usage accumulated since the prior reading for this asset, typically distance or hours; confirm units and calculation logic with SME.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record for audit purposes.
Final reading on the old meter just before it was removed or replaced.
Starting reading on the new meter immediately after installation; may be zero or a calibrated carryover value.
User or process that most recently updated this record in the application layer.
Number of meter rollovers accounted for across this change, used to maintain an accurate cumulative total.
User or process that created the record, for audit trail.
Timestamp when the record was initially created.
User or process that last modified the record; likely overlaps with application-level modifier fields.
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
